person.persName: Thomas Boyd (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer and magistrate)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer and magistrate. Kentucky native. Son of Andrew Boyd and Hannah Boyd. Married to Dulcena B. Throckmorton Boyd in Nicholas County, Kentucky, in March 1856. Farmer in Harrison County in 1850. Household owned four enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860. Magistrate in Harrison County in 1863.
